title: Immortal Life Directly Download
description:
Immortal Life is a beautiful single-player management game where you play as a member of a cultivation sect. Fleeing the destruction of your community, you discover a breathtaking valley where a young community welcomes you with open arms. You set yourself to work relentlessly, decided to help your new brothers and sisters make this settlement grow and flourish into a prosperous village . You are tasked with taking care of the crops – but often, people will need a pair of extra hands to collect different kinds of raw materials, hunt more food, or build new facilities. The Gunk
The more you help your brothers and sisters, the stronger your relationship with them will become – as they open to you, you will get new items, missions, and skills. The valley itself is waiting for you to know it as well – a wonderful place, full of secrets to learn and discover. Strengthening your bounds with the whole community, and finding happiness in it, is as important to your spiritual growth as successfully managing your village. Focus on the present, on every small step that leads you to your ultimate goal. Enjoy the beauty of your valley, and make it grow through care and hard work.
